title: Scientific Investigation - Grade 7
content:
# Scientific Investigation - Grade 7

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand the fundamental concepts of Scientific Method, Variables, Data Collection
- Apply scientific principles to real-world situations
- Analyze and interpret scientific data related to Scientific Investigation

## Introduction
This lesson explores Scientific Investigation, focusing on Scientific Method, Variables, Data Collection. Students will learn through hands-on activities,
demonstrations, and practical applications relevant to Sri Lankan context.

## Main Content
This section covers Scientific Method, Variables, Data Collection. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Key Concepts
Scientific Method, Variables, Data Collection

## Activities
1. Laboratory experiment demonstrating S
2. Group discussion on applications in Sri Lanka
3. Problem-solving exercises
4. Real-world case studies

## Assessment
Students will be assessed through practical work, written tests, and project presentations.

## Resources
- Textbook: Science for Grade 7 (Sri Lankan Curriculum)
- Laboratory equipment
- Digital resources and simulations
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to Scientific Investigation
